jobs.extract: I was working as a web developper in La Ligne Web, a digital agency. My main missions are to create web sites under Prestashop and Wordpress with SEO Optimisation and AMP (Accelerate Mobile page  frameworks). I am working on projects with Ruby on Rails and Gitlab too.

In Extenso is a group of national accountants, part of Deloitte. I did a 6-month internship in the communication department at In Extenso Mediterranee. My main mission was to bring a support to communication services by customers & leads analyse ( data analyse, survey...),  creaton of events supports tools and articles publications (on Wordpress).
